thread.section_title: Rome Life Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A fantastic and welcoming hotel
thread.title_full: A fantastic and welcoming hotel - Review of Rome Life Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Ian_Ssali
title: A fantastic and welcoming hotel
text:
I stayed in this hotel for just one night with my girlfriend and we really enjoyed how everyone was so friendly and willing to help us. At the reception there was Ms. Silvia who really made sure we had everything we needed.
The hotel is well-furnished, clean and very cosy. Our room was excellent and we enjoyed it very much together with the breakfast, delicious and everyone ready to serve and make us feel very comfortable, not in an intrusive way but in a very "Rome Life Hotel" way.
The hotel is very well-located and well-connected with the main public transports in Rome. There is not far away the Episcopal Church, Palazzo delle Esposizioni, Piazza Venezia.
Highly recommended.
My girlfriend and I will surely book this hotel again.
